level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this subchapter or the application of such provision to certain circumstances be held invalid, the remainder of this subchapter and the application of such provision to circumstances other than those as to which it is held invalid shall not be affected thereby.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-68
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-68, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-201.
